name: Asmit Sanjay Rajaramkar
title: Founder & Director
message: Veliora TechWorks is built on the principles of innovation, integrity, and excellence. We are committed to delivering reliable technology solutions, maintaining high professional standards, and creating long-term value for our clients through trust, quality, and consistent results.
bio: The Founder of Veliora TechWorks is a visionary technology professional driven by a commitment to innovation, quality, and ethical business practices. With a strong understanding of global technology trends and modern digital solutions, the founder established Veliora TechWorks to deliver reliable, scalable, and professionally managed technology services. The company was built with the goal of combining technical excellence with transparency, accountability, and a client-first approach, positioning Veliora TechWorks as a trusted long-term technology partner for businesses worldwide.
